message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob. Every round is costing you money!
Let's meet in the middle, Alice. We can both walk away with a good amount.
The clock is ticking, Bob. Another round, and your share shrinks again.  Don't be greedy!
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm losing value each round, but I'm not desperate. Meet me closer to the middle, and we can end this.
This is my final offer, Bob. You're losing serious money with every passing round. Take this deal before it's too late!
